attributes.action: initiate an immediate review of the rules regarding MPs expense claims and 2nd homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be an immediate reduction in the range of items that can be claimed for on expenses (no more luxury items,'high quality furniture', taxis for shopping...etc). There should be a reduced limit on the total amount claimable on any item. Anyone whose first home is within the M25 should not be funded for a second home. 
All the above information should be permanently accessible by the public (whose money is funding this extravagance).

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
